tasks.title: Fix orchestrator worker management

Should make OFX-002 tests pass.

tasks.title: Fix launcher state sync
tasks.description: Add sync_state() method to launcher to reconcile internal state with orchestrator. Ensure launcher and orchestrator worker dictionaries stay consistent. Should make OFX-003 tests pass.
